p: I suggest that the reader reflect on this key issue: what would be the best strategy for a virus to fulfill its main objective, that is, to reproduce the most efficient way? Certainly, it is not killing its host, but instead keeping it alive as long as possible to allow its maximum reproductive capability, or in other words, the most effective way to fulfill the purpose of its existence. And that is exactly what the SARS-CoV-2 does, and what distinguish it from the previous corona species.
